info.name: Whatpulse recolored
info.description: Makes the Whatpulse website more colorful (here blue but you can change it if you prefer another color) and easier to read, for those who have problems reading the small text in all the tables.
info.additionalInfo: I do know that it isn't complete. I still have some pages to rework, but for now all the menu i use are finished to 90%.
